title: The Mystery of the Screaming Clock
description: The alarm clock went off with the bloodcurdling scream of a woman in mortal terror!  Who could have made such a clock--and why?The Three Investigators immediately set out to discover where the mysterious clock came from.  When they come across a run-down house in Hollywood, they find an entire room full of dreadful clocks--and time is running out!
author: Robert Arthur
